name: Cubito (MonoFlauta)
description:
I developed this game for one of my university courses. I hope you have as much fun playing it as I had while making it. Also, this is my first game ever made with AS3 and not AS2

You only need to use the arrow keys to play it. Move the yellow square to reach the blue one through the different levels. Use the other coloured shapes to reach your goal. Also, remember you can climb and sometimes, go through walls.

-33 Levels
-8 different squares to interact with

PS: Sorry, no pause or mute option :(

Hope you like it!

OH and yes, you can win it! :D
